attributes.additional_details: Gavin Williamson’s handling of the grading process after exams were cancelled was horrific and put the futures of thousands of young people in jeopardy. The system wasted the time of teachers as well as putting significant stress on young people already going through a very difficult time.
attributes.background: Call for Gavin Williamson’s resignation after the appalling way GCSE and A Level results were handled this year.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
